title: Education Counseling
description:
Science or Arts? Engineering or Pre-medical? Higher studies or Job? All of us at some point go through this problem.
If you are feeling clueless about what career you should pursue then you are in the right place.
 Telecounseling offers educational counseling to guide students, to make the right decision for their studies and choose the right career
listHead: 4 main cores of Telecounseling educational services

title: Substance Abuse Counseling
description: Substance abuse is the use of illegal drugs or the use of prescription or over-the-counter drugs or alcohol for purposes other than those for which they are meant to be used, or in excessive amounts.The Substance Abuse Counselor provides counseling and support to patients suffering from drug or alcohol dependency, educates families on the best ways to help in the recovery process, and works with both inpatient clients and those participating in an outpatient program.

title: Cognitive counseling
description:
Cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) is a treatment approach that helps you recognize negative or unhelpful thought and behavior patterns. 
 Why is online cognitive counseling best? 
 Patients may participate in online therapy whenever and where ever they like, which provides the facility that may help depressed and shy patients who are reluctant to speak to a health care professional.

title: Mental health Counseling
description: Mental health counseling is a formal, purposeful partnership between a client and mental health professional.
listHead: Telecounseling Mental health counseling provides counseling for a variety of mental disorders

title: Bipolar disorder
description: Bipolar disorder is a mental disorder that causes changes in a personâ€™s mood, energy, and ability to function.
listHead: Bipolar disorder can be treated by

title: Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)
description: Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) is a psychiatric disorder that can diagnose to people who have passed through traumatic event like an inevitable accident, violence, failure and tragedy like rape or who have been threatened of death.
lists: Physical impact such as pain, sweating, nausea

title: Child-Centered play therapy
description: Online child-centered play therapy has the greatest impact on clients to help them to take services from their home in summer and when they are not able to go physically present in the center. Play is how children express their feelings and experiences and play in their way. The therapists observe them keenly and resolve their problems appropriately, and solve their psychological issues through play.

title: Schizophrenia
description: Schizophrenia may result in some combination of hallucination, delusion, and extremely disordered thinking and behavior that impair daily functioning and can be disabling. People with schizophrenia require lifelong treatment.
lists: Negative symptoms such as reduced emotional expressions
